short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It's about time.
This extension will gently remind you everytime you try to access social media so you can better spend your time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of opening social media everytime you have a single second of boredom? Do you start scrolling automatically, almost like out of muscle memory?
Break the cycle. This extension will remind you to think about your decision every time you open social media so you can consciously decide if you really want to distract yourself or if you rather do something else with your time.
Sometimes you only need some time to think so you can make the rigth decision.
